pr_title: Adds VirtualFile.download and uses it in the FileImportJob

timeline.message:
Provides VirtualFile.download()

This will yield a FileHandle to directly access the contents of the
wrapped file. By default a temporary file will be created and
and used. However, some roots might provide a direct way
of accessing a file (e.g. when working on local files already).

Adds an additional method for attaching a file.

If the contents of a file are already available as FileHandle,
we can directly use this. Using a remote storage like S3
this might save us from downloading the same file twice.

BREAKING: Uses a FileHandle to prevent duplicate downloads of the file being processed.

If we're using a remote storage we previously downloaded the same file twice
(first to attach it, then to process it). We're now making a local copy and use
this for both steps.

This is a breaking change as the internal API changed for subclasses.
